Sentencas: The application of doped ceria as an anode material in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is described.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell with a gadolinia-doped ceria anode: preparation and performance

Sentencas: Deposition of an anchoring layer of YSZ particles was used to obtain sufficient adhesion between a porous Ce0.6Gd0.4O1.8 (CG4) anode and an yrttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte without detrimental reaction.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell with a gadolinia-doped ceria anode: preparation and performance

Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell with a gadolinia-doped ceria anode: preparation and performance

Sentencas: No carbon deposition was found on CG4 after cell operation at a steam-to-carbon ratio of 0.3 for 1000 h. Cells sustained several rapid thermal cycles in the temperature interval 200-1000 degrees C and a full redox cycle without degradation.
